text: Thomas Paulsamy is the serving Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Dindigul, India. He is the second bishop of the diocese. == Early life & education == He was born on 2 August 1954 in N. Poolampatty, Diocese of Tiruchy. He has acquired Masters in Arts. He studied Philosophy & Theology at St. Paul's Seminary, Tiruchirapalli and M.Th at Maryknoll School of theology, New York, USA. == Priesthood == He was ordained a priest on 25 May 1977. == Episcopate == He was appointed Bishop of Dindigul on 11 April 2016 by Pope Francis and ordained on 22 May 2016 by Salvatore Pennacchio == References == Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Roman Catholic bishops in India Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Francis Category:Maryknoll School of Theology alumni
